languages.text: "С поверхности одного из местных миров транслируется сигнал бедствия. Передача нечеткая, точное содержание сообщения не определено — либо передача искажена, либо выведен из строя сам ретранслятор, либо сообщение составлено на незнакомом нам языке".

"A distress signal is being broadcast from the surface of one of the local worlds. The transmission quality is poor and the message cannot be deciphered either due to distortion, due to the damage done to the retranslator, or perhaps because the message is being broadcast an unfamiliar language."
languages.original_text: "С поверхности одного из местных миров транслируется сигнал бедствия. Передача нечеткая, точное содержание сообщения не определено — либо передача искажена, либо выведен из строя сам ретранслятор, либо сообщение составлено на незнакомом нам языке".

traits.locale_text: "A distress signal is being broadcast from the surface of one of the local worlds. The transmission quality is poor and the message cannot be deciphered either due to the distortion, due to the damage done to the repeater or perhaps due to it being delivered in an unfamiliar language."

"A distress signal is being broadcast from the surface of one of the local worlds. The transmission quality is poor and the message cannot be deciphered either due to the distortion, due to the damage done to the repeater or perhaps due to it being delivered in an unfamiliar language."

"A distress signal is being broadcast from the surface of one of the local worlds. The transmission quality is poor and the message cannot be deciphered either due to distortion, due to the damage done to the retranslator, or perhaps because the message is being broadcast an unfamiliar language."

"A distress signal is being broadcast from the surface of one of the local worlds. The transmission quality is poor and the message cannot be deciphered either due to distortion, due to the damage done to the retranslator, or perhaps because the message is being broadcast an unfamiliar language."

"A distress signal is being broadcast from the surface of one of the local worlds. The transmission quality is poor and the message cannot be deciphered either due to distortion, due to the damage done to the retranslator, or perhaps because the message is being broadcast an unfamiliar language."

languages.text: « Nous captons un signal de détresse émis depuis la surface de l'une des planètes locales. La qualité de la transmission est médiocre et le décryptage du message est impossible, peut-être en raison de la distorsion du signal, de dommages infligés au retranscripteur, ou parce qu'il est diffusé dans une langue inconnue. »
languages.original_text: "A distress signal is being broadcast from the surface of one of the local worlds. The transmission quality is poor and the message cannot be deciphered either due to distortion, due to the damage done to the retranslator, or perhaps because the message is being broadcast an unfamiliar language."

traits.locale_text: « Nous captons un signal de détresse émis depuis la surface de l'une des planètes locales. La qualité de la transmission est médiocre et le décryptage du message est impossible, peut-être en raison de la distorsion du signal, de dommages infligés au retranscripteur, ou parce qu'il est diffusé dans une langue inconnue. »

languages.text: “某个本地世界的表面发来了求救信号。传输质量很差，信息无法破译，可能是由于信号失真，也可能是由于转译器受损，或是由于信号使用的是某种陌生的语言。”
languages.original_text: "A distress signal is being broadcast from the surface of one of the local worlds. The transmission quality is poor and the message cannot be deciphered either due to distortion, due to the damage done to the retranslator, or perhaps because the message is being broadcast an unfamiliar language."

traits.locale_text: “某个本地世界的表面发来了求救信号。传输质量很差，信息无法破译，可能是由于信号失真，也可能是由于转译器受损，或是由于信号使用的是某种陌生的语言。”

languages.text: "Von der Oberfläche einer der Welten in der Nähe wird ein Notsignal gesendet. Die Übertragungsqualität ist schlecht, und die Nachricht lässt sich nicht verschlüsseln. Entweder, weil der Rückübersetzer beschädigt und die Nachricht daher verzerrt ist ... oder vielleicht weil sie in einer unbekannten Sprache gesendet wird."
languages.original_text: "A distress signal is being broadcast from the surface of one of the local worlds. The transmission quality is poor and the message cannot be deciphered either due to distortion, due to the damage done to the retranslator, or perhaps because the message is being broadcast an unfamiliar language."

traits.locale_text: "Von der Oberfläche einer der Welten in der Nähe wird ein Notsignal gesendet. Die Übertragungsqualität ist schlecht, und die Nachricht lässt sich nicht verschlüsseln. Entweder, weil der Rückübersetzer beschädigt und die Nachricht daher verzerrt ist ... oder vielleicht weil sie in einer unbekannten Sprache gesendet wird."

languages.text: «Se está emitiendo una señal de socorro desde la superficie de uno de los mundos de cercanos. La transmisión no es de muy buena calidad y la distorsión dificulta el descifrado del mensaje, lo que puede deberse a que el retraductor está dañado, o se está emitiendo en un idioma desconocido».
languages.original_text: "A distress signal is being broadcast from the surface of one of the local worlds. The transmission quality is poor and the message cannot be deciphered either due to distortion, due to the damage done to the retranslator, or perhaps because the message is being broadcast an unfamiliar language."

traits.locale_text: «Se está emitiendo una señal de socorro desde la superficie de uno de los mundos de cercanos. La transmisión no es de muy buena calidad y la distorsión dificulta el descifrado del mensaje, lo que puede deberse a que el retraductor está dañado, o se está emitiendo en un idioma desconocido».

languages.text: 「現地惑星の地上の一箇所から、遭難信号が送られています。信号の品質が低く、歪んでいるのか、翻訳機が損傷しているのか、それとも未知の言語で発信されているかの原因で、メッセージは解読できません」
languages.original_text: "A distress signal is being broadcast from the surface of one of the local worlds. The transmission quality is poor and the message cannot be deciphered either due to distortion, due to the damage done to the retranslator, or perhaps because the message is being broadcast an unfamiliar language."

traits.locale_text: 「現地惑星の地上の一箇所から、遭難信号が送られています。信号の品質が低く、歪んでいるのか、翻訳機が損傷しているのか、それとも未知の言語で発信されているかの原因で、メッセージは解読できません」

languages.text: "Yerel dünyaların birinin yüzeyinden bir imdat çağrısı yayınlanıyor. İletinin kalitesi kötü ve mesaj; bozunum sebebiyle, yeniden çeviricinin aldığı hasar veyahut bilinmeyen bir dilde yayınlanıyor olması sebebiyle deşifre edilemiyor."
languages.original_text: "A distress signal is being broadcast from the surface of one of the local worlds. The transmission quality is poor and the message cannot be deciphered either due to distortion, due to the damage done to the retranslator, or perhaps because the message is being broadcast an unfamiliar language."
